last_episode_to_air.name: I'll Be Right Here
last_episode_to_air.overview: The day after the party, Amara and Simon refuse to talk to Noah. To make amends, Noah steps up and faces one of his biggest fears.

name: The Healing Powers of Dude
overview: Noah, an 11-year-old boy with social anxiety disorder, has to start middle school, he turns to a mutt named Dude, a sarcastic emotional support dog who might need Noah as much as Noah needs him.
tagline: The best dog for the job (wasn't available)

episodes.name: Second Step: Homeroom
episodes.overview: On his first day of middle school, Noah's anxiety is so intense that he can't make it through the door. Enter Dude, a lovable emotional support dog.

episodes.name: Getting to Know You
episodes.overview: Amara and Simon help a panicked Noah prepare for a class presentation. Meanwhile, Karen encourages Marvin to start sculpting again.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: Noah's nervous about having friends over to play video games. With Marvin and Karen focused on supporting Noah, Embry sneaks out of the house.

episodes.name: Lord of the Bus
episodes.overview: Noah confronts a new challenge: riding the bus to school. When bullies pick on Simon, Amara encourages Noah to stand up to them.

episodes.name: Middle School Musical
episodes.overview: Amara wonders why she didn't get the lead in the school musical. And the pressure's on when Valerie starts following Noah on social media.

episodes.name: Buried Treasure
episodes.overview: A gallery owner is coming to see Marvin's new sculpture -- but Dude breaks it! While Embry stalls, Dude and Noah dig for the missing piece.

episodes.name: House Party of Horrors
episodes.overview: Noah stresses about finding a costume for Valerie's Halloween party. Simon decides to tell Amara he likes her -- but Amara has a crush on someone else.

episodes.name: I'll Be Right Here
episodes.overview: The day after the party, Amara and Simon refuse to talk to Noah. To make amends, Noah steps up and faces one of his biggest fears.
